workflow.name: N8N Advanced URL Parsing and Shortening Workflow - Switchy.io Integration
workflow.description:
[![Video Overview of template  Advanced URL Parsing and Shortening Workflow - Switchy.io Integration](https://img.youtube.com/vi/c7yCZhmMjtI/maxresdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/c7yCZhmMjtI)

## Overview

This N8N workflow facilitates advanced URL parsing and shortening, incorporating metadata extraction, OpenGraph tag handling, and integration with Switchy API for link management. It employs various nodes for URL processing, metadata extraction, and creation or updating of shortened links with enriched metadata.

![Screenshot of template  Advanced URL Parsing and Shortening Workflow - Switchy.io Integration](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53646661632_fe2acba561_o.png)

## Features

- **URL Metadata Extraction:** Parses URLs to extract metadata such as titles, descriptions, images, and favicons.
- **OpenGraph API Integration:** Utilizes OpenGraph API for detailed metadata retrieval.
- **Switchy API Integration:** Manages shortened links via the Switchy API.
- **GitHub API Integration:** Uses GitHub for hosting images related to the URLs.
- **Screenshot Capabilities:** Captures screenshots of web pages as part of metadata.
- **API Authorization and Configuration:** Manages API keys and configurations for external service integration.

## Workflow Structure

1. **Split In Batches:** Processes URLs in batches.
2. **API Auth:** Configures API authorization.
3. **URL Processing Nodes:** Extract metadata using various nodes like Get Headers, OpenGraph API, and Meta tags Scraper.
4. **Conditional Nodes:** Include IF OpenGraph Invalid and If - Enable ScreenShots for logic handling.
5. **Data Aggregation:** Uses nodes like Method 1 - META for final metadata aggregation.
6. **Switchy API:** Handles link creation and updating.
7. **GitHub Integration:** Hosts screenshots and images on a personal GitHub repository.
8. **Final Output:** Provides the shortened URL after processing.

## API Stack

| API                         | Description                                     |
|---------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|
| `switchy`                | For creating and updating shortened links.      |
| `opengraph`             | To retrieve URL metadata using OpenGraph tags.  |
| `dub.sh`                    | Used for scraping meta tags from web pages.     |
| `microlink`              | Captures screenshots of web pages.              |
| `pxl.to`                    | Alternative service for capturing screenshots.  |
| `favicone`                  | Retrieves favicons for given URLs.              |
| `github`                    | Hosts images and screenshots on GitHub repo.    |
| `statically`             | Used for CDN services and image hosting.        |
| _Other APIs_                    | _Additional APIs used for various purposes._    |

## GitHub Repository Setup

To use this workflow, ensure your GitHub API is linked for hosting images. Set up a repository where the workflow can upload screenshots and other related images. This repository will be referenced in the workflow nodes where images are handled.

## Configuration

Before running the workflow, set up the necessary API keys and configurations in the **API Auth** node. Adjust batch size and other parameters as needed.

## Error Handling

The workflow includes nodes like **Stop and Error** for robust error handling, post an issue and mention the creator using [N8N community](https://community.n8n.io).

## Contributions

This workflow is open for community contributions. Enhancements and improvements are welcome.

workflow.name: [n8n] Advanced URL Parsing and Shortening Workflow - Switchy.io Integration

parameters.content:
## URL META TAGS DATA
**This part** is used to parse long link data like title, descraption, image all them served in header with tags called. [URL metadata](https://ogp.me/)

## Switchy API Limits:
- 10.000 links/day.
- 1.000 links/hour max.
- 16 links /minute max.

values.name: Dark Mode ?
values.booleanValue: ={{ $json['With your brand, Do you Like dark mode ?'].replace('no','false').replace('yes','true') }}

values.name: Scan LongURL
values.stringValue: ={{ $json['scan Long URLs from virus/Phishing ? (Shorting a phishing URL will ban your domain from SEO)'] }}

values.name: Custom slug
values.stringValue: =<Optional: Slug is the path of shortened URL - default is random 5 chars>

values.name: tags
values.stringValue: =<Optional: Add tags if you need, each keyword seperated by "," for example: Marketing, Media, Shortened>

values.name: Custom Domain (CNAME)
values.stringValue: =<Optional: Use your custom domain linked to Switchy, otherwise keep it empty to use default domain swiy.co>

values.name: ogTitle
ogDescription
Favicon

parameters.content:
## Switchy API
**Create or Update** Link. [Based on their API docs](https://google.com)

# README
## N8N META Config
### 1- **Opengraph Image mode**: `screenshot` or `source` or `brand`
### - **screenshot**: _take a screenshot for web page based on longurl._
[![Screenshort Mode Demo](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53485029368_917acda850_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/mefwo.png)
### - **source**: _scrape the source longurl og image and use it_
[![Source Mode Demo](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53485194899_d6141292eb_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/cowyl.png)
### -  **brand**: _Generate blank background, color based on `Dark Mode` option_
[![Brand Mode Demo Dark](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53484898721_94e15670b0_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/gvhok.png) [![Brand Mode Demo White](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53485202839_680a5e825b_o.png)](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/ARHAEEM/n8n-templates-demos/main/screenshots/n8n.io/og/yguse.png)
### 2- **Dark Mode**: `true` or `false` (_Working with `brand` OGI mode only._)
- **true**: generate **black** patteren as background og image for the texts.
- **false**: generate **white** patteren as background og image for the texts.
### 3- **Brand Name**: Used for `brand` ogi background. The limit of brand name is 18 characters total.


## Switchy API Workflow Configuration
### This is part of Switchy API config i covered in this workflow.
| Input Field           | Description                                      |
|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| **`Switchy API Key`**       | _API Key for Switchy integration._                 |
| **`LongURL`**               | _The long URL to be shortened._                    |
| **`Custom slug`**           | _Custom slug for the shortened URL._               |
| **`tags`**                  | _Tags associated with the link._                   |
| **`Switchy Folder ID`**     | _ID of the Switchy folder to use._                 |
| **`Custom Domain (CNAME)`** | _Custom domain linked to Switchy._                 |


### This is public APIs I've Used in Workflow
#### Meta Data Stack
- **Manual Get Headers**: Custom HTTP request to fetch headers.
- **Dub.sh**: Scraping meta tags from web pages.
- **OpenGraph API**: Using OpenGraph to retrieve meta information.
#### Screenshot Stack
- **Method 1 - SCR**: First method for taking screenshots (API name microlink).
- **Method 2 - SCR**: Second method for taking screenshots (API name pxl.to).

parameters.content:
# FYI:-
- ### **This workflow can be for any URL Shortener by just changing the API Services for the shortener SaaS.**
- ### **Do not use it for spam purposes as the used APIs is mostly workaround methods and not for "Big Use Cases".**
- ### **Breaking the APIs will force me to not share them free. and yes this workflow not for productions.**
- ### **Support 1:1 not included with this workflow. post anything you have** [here](https://community.n8n.io) and mention my account @Nskha.
- ### **Follow my new templates updates** [on telegram](https://nodemation.t.me).

                                                         [![N8N Creator Profile - Nskha](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/Automations-Project/n8n-templates/main/stats.min.svg)](https://n8n.io/creators/nskha)

user.name: Nskha

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
